items.title: ServiceNow Stock Surges After Blowout Quarter, Bullish Retail Buzz Hits New High
items.description: BofA boosted ServiceNow's price target to $1,200, citing strong Q2 results and a robust pipeline development through year-end.

items.title: Trump Asserts He Doesn’t Intend To ‘Destroy’ Elon Musk’s Companies, Wants US Firms To ‘Thrive’
items.description: In the past, Trump has claimed that Elon Musk was “very upset” about his ‘Big, Beautiful Bill’ proposing to eliminate EV subsidies.

items.title: Mobileye CEO Sees Inflection In 2027 Growth Trajectory As Company Hikes Full-Year Revenue Outlook: Retail Thinks Stock Is Still A ‘Bit Expensive’
items.description: The company stated that the new guidance includes its estimates of production impacts related to current tariffs imposed on complete vehicles imported...

items.title: Union Pacific Confirms Merger Talks With Rival Norfolk Southern To Create A Transcontinental Railroad Behemoth
items.description: A Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger would be the largest such deal in the railroad sector, according to a Reuters report.

items.title: Tron Stock Slides In Nasdaq Debut After Reverse Merger With SRM
